verses.text: \w During|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w reign|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* successive \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*.”

\w At|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, David \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. (\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Amorites. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w taken|strong="H5221"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w concerning|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7065"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.)

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* amends \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w We|strong="H6213"\w* need \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3701"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* anyone \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*.” “\w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* ask, \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*,” \w he|strong="H6213"\w* replied.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* answered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w As|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w plotted|strong="H3615"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w exterminate|strong="H8045"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* existing \w within|strong="H3320"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

\w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w hang|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \f + \fr 21:6 \ft Or expose them or execute them; similarly in verse 9\f* before \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* chosen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.” “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w hanged|strong="H3363"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

After \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, God \w answered|strong="H6279"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w prayers|strong="H6279"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land. Four Battles against the Philistines (1 Chronicles 20:4–8)

\w Once|strong="H5750"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* waged \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w exhausted|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w Ishbi-benob|strong="H3430"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* descendant \w of|strong="H5221"\w* Rapha,\f + \fr 21:16 \ft Or the giant; also in verses 18, 20, and 22\f* whose \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w spear|strong="H7013"\w* \w weighed|strong="H4948"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H4948"\w* \f + \fr 21:16 \ft 300 shekels is approximately 7.5 pounds or 3.4 kilograms.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* bearing \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* sword, resolved \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Some \w time|strong="H5750"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* \w Gob|strong="H1359"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. \w At|strong="H4421"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w* \w Sibbecai|strong="H5444"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w Saph|strong="H5593"\w*,\f + \fr 21:18 \ft Saph is a variant of Sippai; see 1 Chronicles 20:4.\f* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w descendants|strong="H3211"\w* \w of|strong="H5221"\w* Rapha.
